headline: What Willis Towers Watson (WTW)'s VM-22-Ready RiskAgility FM Upgrade Means For Shareholders
summary: Earlier this month, Willis Towers Watson released the next generation of its U.S. RiskAgility FM Library models, fully embedding VM-22 reserving requirements for non-variable annuities and enhancing asset-liability integration, projection efficiency, and support for complex investment strategies. This upgrade reinforces Willis Towers Watson’s role in helping insurers handle evolving regulatory reserving frameworks with greater accuracy, transparency, and operational scale across annuity and...
